pages.title: ℧ Eight of Cups ℧
pages.text: Spirit of Abandoned Success$(br)     ♄ Saturn in ♓ Pisces

A robed person is deserting the cups of past enterprises.$(br)  What was once their joy, undertaking, and concern, is now behind them. They walk uphill, literally going on to higher things.$(br)  At the shore, eight cups are stacked orderly like a wall but incomplete, giving the sense of stability and need for progress.$(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Possibility of change in a stable situation. Flashes of

excitement, movement.$(br)  May mean that a matter which has been thought to be important is really of slight consequence - either for good or evil.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Stability becomes emphasized. Feasting, great joy.$(br)  Seeing the value in what you have. Resisting a desire to move on.
